characters.name: Troll
characters.description: A troll that will make everyone laugh with his antics and fun stories!

characters.name: Winged Unicorn
characters.description: A magical winged unicorn that will bring fairy tale and magic to your celebration!

characters.name: Fixies
characters.description: The Fixies are always ready to fix any toy and set up a fun game!

characters.name: Racer
characters.description: A racer who will arrange thrilling races and competitions for everyone!

characters.name: Spider-Man
characters.description: Spider-Man will save the party and show off cool webs and tricks!

characters.name: Transformer
characters.description: A Transformer who will amaze everyone with his transformations and protect all the guests!

characters.name: Pirates
characters.description: Pirates who will set up a true sea adventure and treasure hunt!

characters.name: Superman
characters.description: Superman who will bring superpower and unforgettable adventures to your celebration!

characters.name: Hunter and Dinosaur
characters.description: Hunter and dinosaur who will show an exciting story from the past!
